casebody.data:
STATE OF OREGON, Respondent, v. GERTRUDE HARVELL, Appellant. (No. 71 87C) 494 P2d 900 Ken C. Hadley, Deputy Public Defender, Salem, argued the cause for appellant. With him on the brief was Gary D. Babcock, Public Defender, Salem. John W. Osburn, Solicitor General, Salem, argued the cause for respondent. With him on the brief was Lee Johnson, Attorney General, Salem.

Argued March 27,

affirmed March 27,

petition for rehearing denied April 25, petition for review denied May TO, 1972

Before Schwab, Chief Judge, and Langtry and Thornton, Judges.
